title: On Two Sides, Two Funerals â€” While Death Toll Mounts In Gaza
teaser: As the violence between Hamas and Israel continues, so too do the funerals that come in its wake. NPR correspondents Ari Shapiro and Emily Harris attended two such funerals today, in Tel Aviv and Gaza respectively, and they tell of what they learned there.
